title: Request Proof of Insurance
description: A customer needs a new auto insurance ID card because they lost their old one.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer's account.

tasks.description: Generate a new digital ID card.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates a PDF of the new ID card.

tasks.description: Send the digital ID card to the customer's registered email address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully emails the document to the customer.
